attributes.action: ignore and dismiss all calls to cut taxes based on income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm fed up reading petitions urging lower income tax!  I do realise no one likes paying tax but, as stated, how else are public services to be funded?  NOT by everyone paying for the services each individual requires; I realise the superficial appeal of that but where would it leave people who CAN'T AFFORD to pay for such services?  Income tax is a way - not perfect by any means but still - of equalising living standards since (to at least the modest extent possible with a top rate of 40% and no longer a lower rate of 10%) those who can afford the most pay the most.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
